mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice ( course_id, user_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_time, receiver_ids ) VALUES ( #{courseId}, #{userId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeTime}, #{receiverIds,typeHandler=com.hwadee.IOTS_SCS.util.StringListTypeHandler} )
mapper.select: SELECT notice_id, course_id, user_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_time, is_send, receiver_ids, read_user_ids FROM notice WHERE #{userId} in (receiver_ids) AND is_send = true ORDER BY notice_time DESC

SELECT n.notice_id, n.course_id, n.user_id, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.notice_time, n.is_send, n.receiver_ids, n.read_user_ids FROM notice n WHERE n.notice_id = #{noticeId} AND n.is_send = true
SELECT notice_id, course_id, user_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_time, is_send, receiver_ids, read_user_ids FROM notice WHERE is_send = #{isSend} ORDER BY notice_time DESC
